semanticColors.title: BACKGROUND_ACCENT
semanticColors.description: Server activity icon, reply line, and thread icon background.

semanticColors.title: BACKGROUND_MODIFIER_ACCENT
semanticColors.description: Channel selected, background folder open, bars at top and bottom of chat.

semanticColors.title: BACKGROUND_MODIFIER_ACTIVE
semanticColors.description: Server/category selected in emoji picker and ephemeral message bg.

semanticColors.title: BACKGROUND_PRIMARY
semanticColors.description: Chat background, notifications tab background, messages tab header background.

semanticColors.title: BACKGROUND_SECONDARY
semanticColors.description: User profile background / Message button / Reply bar / Server selector background in emoji picker / Settings background / Folders background / 2 buttons under server list (Join server & Find group).

semanticColors.title: BACKGROUND_SECONDARY_ALT
semanticColors.description: Background for tags in forum posts, code block borders, and forum channel buttons. (Check BG_BASE_TERTIARY)

semanticColors.title: BACKGROUND_TERTIARY
semanticColors.description: Emoji picker line, background search filter.

semanticColors.title: BG_BACKDROP
semanticColors.description: Background when a contextual menu is open.

semanticColors.title: INTERACTIVE_ACTIVE
semanticColors.description: Unread channel icons, unread server, selected tab.

semanticColors.title: INTERACTIVE_MUTED
semanticColors.description: Disabled switches background, quote line, and muted channel names.

semanticColors.title: INTERACTIVE_NORMAL
semanticColors.description: Unselected tabs / back arrow, search icon, emoji button in chat / 'is typing' text.

semanticColors.title: BG_BRAND
semanticColors.description: See BRAND_500 Screenshots (Send button + 'dot' on the home button).

semanticColors.title: BORDER_STRONG
semanticColors.description: Even more borders + Forwarded message line.

semanticColors.title: BG_SURFACE_RAISED
semanticColors.description: Cards in profile view and “You” tab / Badge background.

semanticColors.title: INPUT_BACKGROUND
semanticColors.description: Search bars, all text input areas (except chat input), + emoji/GIFs/Stickers background.

semanticColors.title: REDESIGN_BUTTON_PRIMARY_PRESSED_BACKGROUND
semanticColors.description: Primary buttons pressed (basically all blurple buttons).

rawColors.title: BLACK_500

rawColors.title: BRAND_260
rawColors.description: 'OP' badge background in forum posts.

rawColors.title: BRAND_360
rawColors.description: Reply background / reply mention toggle.

rawColors.description: Button colors / 'edit profile' & 'Add status' background, home button accent.

rawColors.title: BRAND_560
rawColors.description: 'OP' badge text color in forum posts + primary buttons pressed (basically all blurple buttons) + reaction border.

rawColors.title: GREEN_360

rawColors.title: PLUM_1

rawColors.title: PLUM_13

rawColors.title: PLUM_14
